Metadata.Title: Big Assasin: Danger in West Park
Metadata.Description: A job for a veteran assasin. A woman and a street proformer who strted a riot in the park a couple days ago have returned, but that isn't the only bad thing. A race "supervisor" disguised a sniper rifle as a camera and is going to shoot one of the racers. And last but not least a military general and his bodygaurd are planting a bomb in a small garden beside the bay to ward off spies.
